snippet.title: Writing Summations in Sigma Notation
snippet.description:
Learn how to write summations in sigma notation in this free math video tutorial by Mario's Math Tutoring. We go through some examples.

0:24 Difference Between a Sequence and a Series 
0:33 Reviewing Sigma Notation
0:57 Example 1 3 + 5 + 7 + 9 +.....
1:08 Arithmetic Sequence Formula
1:50 Writing in Sigma Notation
3:00 Example 2 100 + 50 + 25 + ...
3:08 Using the Geometric Sequence Formula to Write in Sigma Notation
3:54 Example 3 (1/2) + (2/3) + (3/4) + ...+ (99/100)

Related Videos:

Learn All About Sequences & Series with My Playlist Here
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLHRatQsym1_hIXmMXI440ZPtp1duqEYkN
